qas.question: What cartoon humorist did some high profile stories for Marvel in the early years?
What was the name of the humorous feature penned by Wolverton?
What duo of kid-themed characters were featured in early Marvel issues?
What early Marvel character may have been envisioned as a female counterpoint to Captain America?
The most popular early Marvel heroes were collectively and colloquially known as what?

plausible_answers.text: the Whizzer, Miss America, the Destroyer, the original Vision, and the Angel

qas.question: Which characters matched the success of the big three?
What cartoon was the Destroyer featured in?

plausible_answers.text: Super Rabbit and the duo Ziggy Pig and Silly Seal

qas.question: What animal characters were featured in Powerhouse Pepper?
Where do the animal comic characters sometimes continue to appear?

context: While no other Timely character would achieve the success of these <a4_0>"big three"<a4_0/>, some notable heroes—many of which continue to appear in <b9_0>modern-day retcon appearances and flashbacks<b9_0/>—include <b5_0>the Whizzer, <a3_0>Miss America<a3_0/>, the Destroyer, the original Vision, and the Angel<b5_0/>. Timely also published one of humor cartoonist <a0_0><b6_0>Basil Wolverton<b6_0/><a0_0/>'s best-known features, <a1_0>"<b7_0>Powerhouse Pepper<b7_0/>"<a1_0/>, as well as a line of children's funny-animal comics featuring popular characters like <b8_0>Super Rabbit and the duo <a2_0>Ziggy Pig and Silly Seal<b8_0/><a2_0/>.
